settings.title: Use as needed with no crash
Energy and focus in your pocket

settings.question: How does Pzaz fix bad breath?
settings.answer: Pzaz uses extra strong peppermint extract to instantly eliminate odors on your tongue and mouth, helping to kill germs and bacteria that cause tooth decay and plaque.

settings.question: What are the ingredients?
settings.answer:
Pzaz contains zero calories and is sugar-free, dairy-free, gluten-free, and vegan.

Active ingredients: caffeine, Vitamin B12, Vitamin C, electrolytes.

Inactive ingredients: water, peppermint and other natural flavors, citric acid, menthol, sucralose and potassium sorbate (for freshness).

settings.question: Why put caffeine in a breath spray?
settings.answer:
By using caffeine in small bursts throughout the day, you can feel energized and focused with no crash, jitters, and with fewer negative effects on your sleep.

One bottle of Pzaz (70 sprays) contains 180 mg of caffeine, which is the equivalent of about two large cups of coffee.

Use three sprays at a time to control your energy all day long without feeling the side effects of excessive caffeine use.

settings.question: What makes Pzaz a healthy choice?
settings.answer: Keep Pzaz in your pocket as a healthier, zero-calorie alternative to gum, mints, candy, energy drinks, coffee, soda, and more.

settings.question: When should I use Pzaz?
settings.answer: Use Pzaz after a stinky lunch, before a hot date, during a long work or study session, while on a terribly long drive.

settings.question: Where is it made?
settings.answer: Pzaz is manufactured in the United States in an FDA-approved facility that follows government mandated Good Manufacturing Processes.

settings.question: What is your Money Back Guarantee?
settings.answer: Click the link at the bottom of the page to learn more, but we offer a Money Back Guarantee to ensure only positive experiences with Pzaz.

settings.question: How many sprays per bottle? How much should I use?
settings.answer:
One tube of Pzaz contains roughly 70 sprays.

If youâ€™re feeling sluggish, tired, or unfocused, try three sprays of Pzaz and see how you feel.

You can confidently and comfortably use Pzaz all day long for energy and focus â€“Â an entire bottle is less than half of the FDA's recommended daily intake.

settings.question: Why is Pzaz healthier than most beverages?
settings.answer:
If you're thirsty, you should really just drink water.

Pzaz is for people who need a little extra refreshment â€“ a zero calorie, super portable, and convenient cont a healthier less caffeinated and more controlled alternative to energy drinks, coffee based beverages, sodas

settings.title: Insanely fresh breath
settings.content: For times where trying to make or get coffee is such a hassle and you just need a little boost, this is the product to get! The intense fresh breath you get from each spray makes it so much better than gum, mints, energy drinks.... basically anything.

settings.title: Caffeine, controlled
settings.content: Pzaz lets me control my energy a few sprays at a time, with zero jitteriness or crash or anxiety. I can even use it later in the evening, enjoy a burst of energy and focus, and still fall asleep a few hours later
